name: Grid Glory
description:
It is super simple and easy 2d simulation RPG game.
Let's make an undefeate party attracted the strongest units.
It is conscientious completely free app.

Party is the largest 60 units.
Player units is 30 types.
Will be enthusiastic about this game!

[Credits]
